Package org.bbi.linuxjoy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LinuxJoystickEventCallback
    An interface with a function that is called when a joystick event is read
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JoyFactory
    Platform-dependent handlers
    LinuxJoystick
    LinuxJoystick is a class that uses the Linux joystick API and presents a nice interface to be used in Java applications.
    LinuxJoystickEvent
    The Linux joystick event structure.
    NoJoy
    NoJoy is a native implementation interface for LinuxJoystick.
    SocketBridge
    Opens a socket interface for the Linux joystick device.
    SocketJoystick
    This joystick implementation reads off a socket instead of a file.
    XboxController
    A nice LinuxJoystick wrapper for Xbox controllers
